## Online Calculators

[Sea Water Density](https://fermi.jhuapl.edu/denscalc.html) - Calculate sea water density and sound speed. 

### Calculators for Acoustics

[Sound Absorption](http://resource.npl.co.uk/acoustics/techguides/seaabsorption/) - Calculate Absorption using the Francois and Garrison, 1982 method. 

[Standard Sphere Target Strength](https://www.fisheries.noaa.gov/data-tools/standard-sphere-target-strength-calculator) - Standard sphere target strength calculator created by Advanced Survey Technologies, SWFSC.
